AssociateResource.name: AssociateResource
AssociateResource.description: Grants permission to associate a resource with a group

CreateCanary.name: CreateCanary
CreateCanary.description: Grants permission to create a canary

CreateGroup.name: CreateGroup
CreateGroup.description: Grants permission to create a group

DeleteCanary.name: DeleteCanary
DeleteCanary.description: Grants permission to delete a canary. Amazon Synthetics deletes all the resources except for the Lambda function and the CloudWatch Alarms if you created one

DeleteGroup.name: DeleteGroup
DeleteGroup.description: Grants permission to delete a group

DescribeCanaries.name: DescribeCanaries
DescribeCanaries.description: Grants permission to list information of all canaries

DescribeCanariesLastRun.name: DescribeCanariesLastRun
DescribeCanariesLastRun.description: Grants permission to list information about the last test run associated with all canaries

DescribeRuntimeVersions.name: DescribeRuntimeVersions
DescribeRuntimeVersions.description: Grants permission to list information about Synthetics canary runtime versions

DisassociateResource.name: DisassociateResource
DisassociateResource.description: Grants permission to disassociate a resource from a group

GetCanary.name: GetCanary
GetCanary.description: Grants permission to view the details of a canary

GetCanaryRuns.name: GetCanaryRuns
GetCanaryRuns.description: Grants permission to list information about all the test runs associated with a canary

GetGroup.name: GetGroup
GetGroup.description: Grants permission to view the details of a group

ListAssociatedGroups.name: ListAssociatedGroups
ListAssociatedGroups.description: Grants permission to list information about the associated groups of a canary

ListGroupResources.name: ListGroupResources
ListGroupResources.description: Grants permission to list information about canaries in a group

ListGroups.name: ListGroups
ListGroups.description: Grants permission to list information of all groups

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list all tags and values associated with a resource

StartCanary.name: StartCanary
StartCanary.description: Grants permission to start a canary, so that Amazon CloudWatch Synthetics starts monitoring a website

StopCanary.name: StopCanary
StopCanary.description: Grants permission to stop a canary

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add one or more tags to a resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove one or more tags from a resource

UpdateCanary.name: UpdateCanary
UpdateCanary.description: Grants permission to update a canary
